issue.title: [Go] Implement Concatenate function for Arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13967](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13967). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is needed for proper handling of MakeArrayFromScalar when dealing with nested types, and likely could be useful in other use cases too.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13967?focusedCommentId=17418367) by Matthew Topol (zeroshade):*
